@rica + 2.5hrs please then ok to close

Thanks a lot Heath

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228


Duracube® will be closing for our annual shut down on 21st December
2021 and we'll be returning on 10th January 2022.

Hi Stella, 

Ok great! 

Please see attached. You will be able to view the PDF files. We added the actual beer type to the circular section and 'Australian made' for the Golden Ale to fill the gap. I hope this is ok.

Great thanks Heath, please send through final art when you can. Appreciate your help, thanks

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228


Duracube® will be closing for our annual shut down on 21st December
2021 and we'll be returning on 10th January 2022.

Hi Stella, 

Sure, I think this will do the trick - let me know?

@heath done updating beer can label , i made two options
- one with duplicate 'premium lager' top and bottom
- second with golden ale top and premium lager bottom

Please check and let me know if you have adjustment, thanks 🙂

dropbox: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/ktzsjbcow6in5av/AAAZg0G-9bUVEXrJCZA4puCna?dl=0
@jaime can you please action the below? Cheers

Thanks Heath, the logo in the centre looks good thanks. Just not loving the DURACUBE above the logo - seems an overkill having Duracube there plus in the logo now. What does it look like either just deleting the top Duracube above the logo, or duplicate the PREMIUM LAGER top and bottom if something is needed to fill in the top section?

Thanks

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228

Hi Stella, 
 
I have attached the artwork for you. 

Please let me know what you think and if you have any changes?

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hello Heath,

Could you please send us an option replacing the acorn symbol in the centre of the top badge on the beer cans with the Duracube logo? The team would prefer use the DC logo and rekon it'll be fine as only supplying them to those who regularly/always use us, so know definitely who we are.

Thanks

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228


Duracube® will be closing for our annual shut down on 21st December
2021 and we'll be returning on 10th January 2022.

Many thanks Heath, that's great

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228


Duracube® will be closing for our annual shut down on 21st December
2021 and we'll be returning on 10th January 2022.

Hi Stella, 

Ah ok, no probs. I have attached a zip file with the artwork and a mockup as the artwork is white-on-white and a little hard to see!! 

Let me know if they need anything else?

Thanks.

Sorry I should've explained - I'm needing the cooler bag one more urgently than beer cans - both different suppliers and bags getting printed first. If you could send this over it'd be great, sorry to be a pain.

Kind regards,

Stella Simpson
Duracube Marketing Coordinator
P. 0428 685 691

Hi Stella, 

Once it's all confirmed we will package up the files for you and send them over.

Thanks Heath I actually prefer that cooler bag artwork so I'll stick to that. I'll confirm the beer cans asap.

Could you please confirm the cooler bag artwork is supplied in this Dropbox link in the correct format I requested it in? Ai file etc... thanks

Kind regards,

Stella Simpson
Duracube Marketing Coordinator
P. 0428 685 691

Hi Stella, 

Great, glad you are liking it. 

Here are the updated files which take into account all of you feedback: 
https://www.dropbox.com/sh/rj0qrmlqip7h36k/AADqoDXwMHCeoN7xohAfvUb6a?dl=0

Let me know what you think?

Hello again Heath,

Could you please send me through a real quick/rough mock of what a 1 colour all white print looks like on the cooler bags? It'll cost us about $400 extra for the 2 colour so wanting to get an opinion here by showing a mockup of each to see if it's worth it.

Thanks

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228


Duracube® will be closing for our annual shut down on 21st December
2021 and we'll be returning on 10th January 2022.

Many thanks Heath, really liking what we see!

I'm just waiting to hear back re the cooler bag - pretty sure it's single colour print we're needing but will confirm. Design is good.

Beer can looks great! Few small things,
1. can we get a duracube logo on here somewhere, even if it's small on the front or back? totally get the thought about not having the male/female symbol on the front as the main image, so what you've done is good thanks, just would be nice to have somewhere a DC logo because some of these will be sent out as full cases of beer not in the cooler bags
2. worried the ESTD 2021 on the front of the can looks like our brand was established in 2021 - any other thoughts or ideas for there? Could we swap it for 'PREMIUM LAGER' or something?
3. Beer types we're using is 'JACKAROO 3.2' and 'CARGO GOLD' - will need one artwork per lager please
4. after 'HAVE ONE ON US' please add a full stop or exclamation mark, whatever looks better

Think that's it :) thanks again for your help!

Regards,
Stella SimpsonMarketing Coordinator
Tel: 1300 387 228


Duracube® will be closing for our annual shut down on 21st December
2021 and we'll be returning on 10th January 2022.

Hi Stella, 

We have the designs ready to show you : )

Here is a quick 2 min video to run you through the design suggestion:

And here is a link to the files you will see in the video:
https://www.dropbox.com/sh/t1pisxnk6ni8cip/AAAx76CFg9V7W-GkQ-oxwGsCa?dl=0

Looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
